What build are you using? That stack trace looks very old, maybe M2?

(In reply to comment #1)
> What build are you using? That stack trace looks very old, maybe M2?

I found it in M2. I will test in the newest build. But I didn't find the same
problem in bug list.

Hi,

I traced this back, and the stack trace below was from before 12/24/04, and
that's also the day that I checked in a null pointer check in HeaderViewer to
avoid the IllegalArgumentException. This particular path is fixed, so I am going
to put the defect in fixed state. Please feel free to open another defect if you
see any problems in the current milestone, but I was able to run through this
scenario without problems.
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
